name: Gmail - Simple Header
description:
================================================================

NOW COMPATIBLE WITH THE NEW GMAIL(2010/9/9). Sorry for being late!

================================================================

Simplify Gmail. Remove the header and footer.
This style leaves the search box at the top so that you can focus on it using the keyboard shortcut "/".

See also:
*Gmail - Slim Sidebar (Fixed): http://userstyles.org/styles/21445
*Gmail - Labels on the Right: http://userstyles.org/styles/20768
*Gmail - Vertical Multiple Inboxes Cleaner: http://userstyles.org/styles/20342
